snippet: Abbas Abdi, who is featured in the new movie “Argo,” says Iran and the United States can solve their problems only through secret negotiations.
abstract: Abbas Abdi, who was involved in 1979 takeover of American embassy in Tehran, on which movie Argo is based, says the only way to solve problems between United States and Iran is through secret negotiations, since growing tension over Iran's nuclear program coupled with lack of normal diplomatic relations between two countries makes other approaches untenable.
lead_paragraph: Abbas Abdi, who is featured in the new movie “Argo,” says Iran and the United States can solve their problems only through secret negotiations.

headline.seo: Spotlight Returns to Abbas Abdi, Iranian Hostage Taker
headline.main: Iran Hostage Taker Returns to the Spotlight, With Insight
